src:
Innalillahi, Bek Timnas Indonesia U-16, Alfin Lestaluhu Meninggal Dunia
01 Nov 2019, 00:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dunia sepak bola Indonesia tengah diselimuti duka menyusul kabar meninggalnya pemain Timnas Indonesia U-16, Alfin Lestaluhu pada Kamis (31/10/2019).
"Innalillahi wainnailaihi rajiuun. Telah berpulang ke Allah SWT saudara Alfin Lestaluhu, pemain Timnas Indonesia U-16," kata Bandung Saputra, media officer PSSI.
Bandung dan PSSI masih belum memberikan keterangan perihal penyebab meninggalnya Alfin. Sebelumnya, pemain asal Maluku tersebut merupakan korban bencana Ambon pada akhir September 2019.
text:
Innalillahi, Indonesian U-16 national team defender, Alfin Lestaluhu died
Nov 01 2019, 00:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian soccer world is covered with sorrow following the news of the death of Indonesian U-16 national team player, Alfin Lestaluhu on Thursday (10/31/2019).
"Innalillahi wainnailaihi rajiuun. Has passed away to Allah SWT brother Alfin Lestaluhu, Indonesia U-16 national team players," said Bandung Saputra, PSSI media officer.
Bandung and PSSI still have not provided information regarding the cause of Alfin's death. Previously, the player from Maluku was a victim of the Ambon disaster at the end of September 2019.
